name: trichologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who studies and treats the hair and scalp (= the skin on the top of the head): Susan saw a trichologist who said the salon had used the wrong chemicals. A common treatment trichologists use to combat hair loss is ultraviolet light.
More examplesFewer examplesA trichologist will recognise which condition she has and recommend treatment.Alternatively, consult a trichologist who can provide scalp treatments and give general advice on diet and haircare. According to a leading trichologist, hair colouring is the fastest growing segment of the hair care market.
